responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "37112CAE4F0722FBB00C14BC6D1006C7", "I bet you think I\'m an idiot? A thief maybe? Come now friend, we don\'t all thrive in the confines of a stall or behind the walls of a barracks. Some of us are a bit wilder at heart, y\'know, need more pasture. At any hay, that ancient ol\' tree in the bay is fallin\' apart. If you could get me a dozen of them healin\' branches, I bet I could really make a difference out in the outlaw villages. They\'ve got kids out there, y\'know. Sick kids.")
name: SQ_Lionhold_0002_Fragments_Jimson_4_Response
